text:
Certain of the laws enforced by WH provide for
R/K regulations. Section 11(c) of FLSA requires the S/L to issue regulations
(Reg 516) prescribing R/K requirements.
html: Certain of the laws enforced by WH provide for R/K regulations. Section 11(c) of FLSA requires the S/L to issue regulations (Reg 516) prescribing R/K requirements.
